sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词都有"通知，告知"之意。
means: inform ： 普通用词，指传达事实或信息，或指经过研究或调查而获得的事实或信息。
acquaint ： 指提供有关信息或情况使某人熟悉某些过程或复杂的情况。
notify ： 指正式通知需要注意的事情。
advise ： 指正式通知某件重要事，所通知的事情与被通知的人有关。

sentence.Network_en: The proprietor was an old acquaint-ance of his.
sentence.Network_cn: 业主是他的一位旧相识。

sentence.Network_en: Please acquaint me with the facts of the case.
sentence.Network_cn: 请把这事的实情告诉我。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 大学英语单词大全 ... I acknowledge that her criticism is just. 我承认她的批评是公正的。 acquaint 使熟悉；使了解 action 作用.
2012年职称英语词汇表最新完整版 - 豆丁网 ... acid adj． 酸的，酸性的 n．酸 acquaint vt． 使熟悉，使认识 * acre n． 英亩.
大学英语单词大全 ... I acknowledge that her criticism is just. 我承认她的批评是公正的。 acquaint 使熟悉；使了解 action 作用.
真题网 - 英语六级高频词汇汇总 ... absurd 荒谬的，荒唐的 2次 acquaint 熟悉，认识。 2次 adhere 坚持，依附 2次.

list.abs: 不过这种点头之交（nodding acquaintance）十分重要，因为一旦需要深交，你知道该去哪里找它。很多深交都是这么从初交变成的。
九十 in English, translation,... ... 旧事 former matter;old affair 旧识 former acquaintance;old friend 救世 salvation.
华纳兄弟影片公司电影列表 - 豆丁网 ... 空军 Air Force 老相识 Old Acquaintance 永恒的少女 The Constant Nymph.
英语短语搭配 - 豆丁网 ... worried about （担心） 4 后接介词 acquainted with （对……熟悉） angrywith sb. （对某人生气）.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French acointier 'make known', from late Latin accognitare, from Latin accognoscere, from ad- 'to' + cognoscere 'come to know'

entry.def: If you acquaint someone with something, you tell them about it so that they know it. If you acquaint yourself with something, you learn about it.

example.ex: ...efforts to acquaint the public with their rights under the new law...
example.tran: 为使公众熟悉新法律所赋予的权利而作出的努力

example.ex: I want to acquaint myself with your strengths and weaknesses.
example.tran: 我想知道你有哪些长处以及不足。

means.word_mean: 1. cause to come to know personally;

sentences.sentence: "permit me to acquaint you with my son"
"introduce the new neighbors to the community"
"you should acquaint yourself with your new computer"
"We familiarized ourselves with the new surroundings"
"Please acquaint your colleagues of your plans to move"

auth_sentence.content: Though the Choiseuls will not acquaint with you.
auth_sentence.res_content: Though the Choiseuls will not acquaint with you.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Though the Choiseuls will not acquaint with you.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 古雅的,古色古香的;古怪的
stems_affixes.word_buile: quaint知道→古怪的[想知道怎么回事]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 认识,相识,了解;相识的人,熟人
stems_affixes.word_buile: acquaint使认识,使了解,使熟悉+ance表名词→n.认识,相识,了解;相识的人,熟人
ac使+quaint知道→使[人们]知道→告知

sentences.en: This book acquaints the students with the ancient cultures of Europe.
sentences.cn: 这本书帮助学生了解欧洲的古代文化。

jushi.english: I have heard about your friend but I'm not acquainted with him.
jushi.chinese: 我听说过你的朋友,但同他不熟。

jushi.english: They acquainted western readers with recent happenings in China.
jushi.chinese: 他们向西方读者介绍了中国最近发生的事情。
